case.state: Oh hi Pinkie! I'm sure you'll be the life of the party today.
Ah, hello Twilight! It's nice to see a familiar face here.
Oh! I didn't think I'd find you in a place like this Rarity!
Rainbow! How nice to see you're here too!
Ah... h-hello, my name is {small}Fluttershy...
Ah, hello Twilight! It's nice to see a familiar face here.
Oh hi Pinkie! I'm sure you'll be the life of the party today.
Rainbow! How nice to see you're here too!
Oh! I didn't think I'd find you in a place like this Rarity!
(D-Dear me... That's a terrifying mask...)
Um... Did someone park their car here?
A-Ah! S-Sorry! I'll move aside right away!
~player~!! Y-You can't just show that before the game even starts!!
~player~! W-Why aren't you wearing any clothes?! You're supposed to strip after you lose!
A-Aren't you showing your chest a little too early, ~player~?!
(Does ~player~ not realize we can see her... lips...?)
Oh my! What a beautiful butterfly! A-And it can talk too?
Oh, this is your classroom? That's... quite something...
B-Best of luck, Twilight. I'm sure we'll have fun tonight.
I-I know you're the hasty kind, b-but please don't be too rough with me Rainbow. I've only played poker a few times before...
With you here I'm sure tonight will be a lot of fun Pinkie!
I hope you don't lose too much Rarity, i-it would be a shame if you had to take your beautiful dress off...
Happy new year ~player~. Hopefully you'll be able to achieve all of your new year resolutions!
I-I can't say I'm too fond of Halloween... it's um... a bit too scary for me.
I know this is an unusual way to spend Christmas Eve, but I'm sure you don't mind, do you ~player~?
Merry Christmas everyone! I hope you enjoy it to the fullest!
Eep! A-A ghost!
Eep! A-A ghost!
W-What..?! In front of all these people?! I-I-I can't do such a thing! I'm sorry, but I must leave.
No no no!! This is too much for me to handle! T-This was all a big mistake..!! I need to get out of here!
D-Do we really need to play in a place this terrifying...?
O-Oh, I didn't expect to see so many familiar faces here today...
(On one hand... having people I know here makes me feel a bit less nervous... on the other hand, i-if I lose... oh dear...)
(Oh no, I'm the only woman here...? Now all their eyes will definitely be on me...)
(N-No men are playing this game...? That's... a bit comforting...)
(Odd... I thought more people would play at once... O-Oh well, I guess it's less embarrassing this way...)
Oh dear... this is more daunting than I thought...
Hello everyone, I'm here to prove to myself I can do things like this...! U-Umm... {small}please go easy on me...

I heard this game could be quite fun. And w-well...
I wanted to try out new things...!
I don't want to exchange any this time, thanks.
I think this is good enough as is.
Ah... I think I'll just get a new hand...
Let me try a different hand please.
Just this one please.
I think I'll only exchange one this time
Just this one will do, dealer.
I would like ~cards~ cards please.
I want to exchange ~cards~.
~cards~ cards if you would be so kind dealer.
You know, all of those holes you might see in the beach all the time tend to be made by crabs! P-Please don't cover them up, that also tends to be their hidey-hole.
Did you know starfish can grow their limbs back? Nature can be so much more magical than what we give it credit for!
Did you know that out of all turtle species, sea turtles tend to be the ones that live the least amount of time? Even so, they still live for quite a while, with some living up to 50 years or more.

Did you know that the largest fish out there is the Ocean sunfish? I can measure up to a maximum of 3.1 meters! Technically the Whale shark is the biggest fish, but I'm sure that's not what you think of when I say "fish".
{small}Yay!
Wonderful!
(B-Breathe in, Fluttershy, you're doing well!)
{small}I-I believe in myself..!
Isn't it just wonderful to see a butterfly flutter by? One of my favorites is the emperor butterfly.
One of the best parts about being a volunteer for the animal rescue center is seeing such a lovely variety of cute little animals!
S-Something I love about waking up in the morning is getting to hear the beautiful singing of all the little birds.
Something wonderful about taking care of animals is that they always return to you all the love you gave to them.
It looks like I may not be out yet..!
I wish I could've gotten these a little earlier...
Thank goodness... I don't think I'm quite ready to forfeit yet...
Have any of you ever listened to what the birds have to say? They do more than just chirp all day!
Y-You know, having flowers in your garden can really make your house feel all the more welcoming! A-And they smell very nice too.
T-That thing you're carrying looks... quite dangerous Brock...
~scarred~... A-Are those {small}s-scars...{!reset} (Oh what am I thinking?! I shouldn't ask such a question in front of other people!)
I-Is that a real gun?! W-Why would you bring that here?! You're... not going to hurt me... {small}right...?
Oh dear, that weapon looks very p-pointy, doesn't it..? {small}Please be careful with it ~blade~...
Better than nothing, isn't it?
W-Well... It could be worse...
I-I guess I can't complain... It's not the worst it could be...
O-Oh dear... This certainly could be better...
W-Well there's still a chance someone has a worse hand... {small}right...?
T-This hand isn't very reassuring...
(Please be enough, please be enough, please be enough...)
S-So, does anyone here have any pets? I'd love to hear all about them!
D-Does anyone here play poker regularly? I-I don't mean just strip poker of course...
Who runs this place anyway? We're not betting money and there was no fee to play. Do they even make money here?
So, i-if I may ask, why did the rest of you come here?
Does anyone here know any j-jokes? Laughter can really umm... {small}h-help the embarrassment go away...?
Ah... well I guess I was a bit unlucky this t-time...
Oh dear, this hand isn't really good at all, is it...?
I-I can't deny it's a bit frustrating to get so unlucky sometimes...
D-Don't worry about me... I can't always expect a good hand now, can I...?
(I knew this wasn't going to go well for me...)
(I-I hope I'm not annoying anyone... this is all so embarrassing...)
(D-Does my hair look messy..? I hope not... It's hardly something I can hide...)
(Perhaps I could have asked someone for poker tips... I'm really not that good at it...)
I-I... I don't like the look of things...
I'm not... I... {small}Oh dear...
Ah... I don't think I'm going to win this time... {small}am I...?
(I'm no good for this kind of games... why did I have to come here...?)
(Stupid Fluttershy... why couldn't you have just stayed at home...)
(Oh Pinkie... I hope you turn back to normal soon...)
P-Pinkie... you're scaring me...
I didn't think I'd ever hear Pinkie use such a language...
Well, that's certainly one way to use your flowers!
(I guess I should just try to ignore Pinkie for now... Please oh please return to normal Pinkie...)
Uh... Well, I certainly hope that's the reason why they are sticky...
I didn't even think of that possibility! I hope that doesn't happen!!
A-Ah! Happy Birthday then! I hope you can enjoy it as much as p-possible!
I certainly hope it doesn't...
Really? W-Well I don't see anything wrong with your bottom Perona.
I-I think I've had my share of surprises for today...
(Huh? W-Why is she taking her jacket off too...? Is it too warm in here for her?)
O-Oh, well... I'm not really much of a dreamer. I just hope to be a better me everyday, and to help as many people, plants and animals as I can.
T-That's... quite the convincing makeup...
Oh! You're back! I'm glad you are. I think you're v-very nice to have around.
Well, personally, the idea of piercing my n-nipples is very scary...
O-Oh, the butterfly is going to play with us...? B-But... how...?
Hmm... Well I don't believe I come from any special world or anything. But I do know Twilight comes from a magical world called Equestria.
Mm... No, not yet at least... {small}I... need to find the right person...
W-Well, believe it or not, I'm very good at math. So I guess that.
R-Really? Well, I don't think it could be my hair, could it...?
Well I don't go shopping particularly often, but if I had to go out, I'd definitely prefer to do it with my friends.
That's a very... horrible ability to have... Why would you want to make others depressed like that...?
Cute? Gosh that's a hard one... I'm not quite sure, I see cute animals all the time, I just can't pick a favorite! ...oh! Actually, I think Spike might be the cutest dog I've seen.
(It seems like Komi-san has a lot of trouble communicating with people... I-I hope she's enjoying the game at least...)
Senko, I think your fox costume is really cute. Did you make it yourself?
You… You look like an animal, and yet you also look like human… What type of creature might you be Dust?
Ooh! Hahaha! Good one Chara!
Oh, ahaha! A pan-tree! I get it now!
Ah, thank goodness that was it! Hahaha!
Rain? I don't know, how does rain tie its shoes?
In a k-kitchen? Hmm... I don't know, what kind of tree might you find in a kitchen?
I-In my face? I um... what sort of flower does that?
A bee? Where?!
If I may ask Fina, what kind of creature is Cupil?
Well, unless I'm not seeing things well, I believe you're right in doing so.
I'm very glad you did, Nagisa.
Tomorrow? Hmm... Well, aside from probably having to buy more seeds for the little birds, nothing interesting.
Well, mainly because I wanted to be more confident, even if just a little. A-And, sometimes, the best way to do that is by trying out very daunting experiences...
Hm... Well, I believe yes. But I guess some people do it "sarcastically". Even so... I think it's insensitive to joke about certain topics regardless of how sarcastic you're being.
F-Famous? No way! T-That would be the worst!
W-Well, to me it's about getting to know people that you can trust, that you want to hang out with, people that will be there for you when you need them.
O-Oh, I'm truly sorry but... I don't have any money on me at the moment...
Well, personally, I already talk with the birds all the time.
W-Well, personally I prefer to keep things natural, but I think should do whatever makes them most comfortable.
Absolutely! Nature is the most beautiful thing there is if you ask me!
Hm? What's that...?
Hm... actually... Polly doesn't look like one of the bad ghosts...
Hm... actually... Spooky isn't all that scary...
You seem to know ~player~ quite well, Chara. Are you two close friends?
This dress I'm wearing was actually designed by my dear friend Rarity here. She's truly amazing, it wouldn't be nearly as beautiful if someone else did it.
Yup
I'm not sure why, but I get the feeling most people don't take you seriously Bi...
This dress I'm wearing was actually designed by my dear friend Rarity. She's truly amazing, it wouldn't be nearly as beautiful if someone else did it.
W-Well, I don't see the problem with the color of my skin... I know many people with yellow skin just like mine.
Oh um... I-I appreciate your worries Meia, but t-this is just how I am most of the time...
T-Thank you Elesa. I think your hair is gorgeous as well.
I'm glad you think so, Lux. In fact, I think I'd be a little scared if that wasn't the case... What with me being the element of kindness and all...
O-Oh, well... It's not that big of a deal, Revy... I came here because I wanted to.
O-Oh! T-Thank you, Fina! And, um... I'm just a normal person as far as I'm aware.
O-Oh? I'm first? I-I see...
Well... I'm certainly not off to a good start... haha...ha...
That's fine, I've still got much I can take off.
W-Well, I guess I didn't come here to keep my clothes on. (I just hope I can keep most of them on...)
Ok, if it's nothing big I can handle it for now... {small}I think...

Ah, me again? O-Ok, I can
d-do it!
I've taken off some things now... B-But I think I can keep going...! {small}...for now.
I think I'm starting to get used to the... umm... {small}the stripping...
I-I guess it is the name of the game...
I was k-kind of hoping I wouldn't have to go this far but... {small}If you want me to...
(O-Ok... breathe in Fluttershy... You can do this...)
A-Ah... I lost h-huh..?
(Oh dear... I'll have to g-get {!reset}naked now...)
O-Oh, well I guess I am the one with the most clothes on after all...
I guess I should be losing some more a-anyway no...?
(So much for being the one with the most clothes on...)
D-Dear me... I'm not doing too well now am I...?
{small}I-It would be nice if I wasn't doing so poorly right now...
T-That's fine..! I'm sure I can... I-I can... (Ooh... I'm not sure I can do this...)
Really? Hm... I guess I have noticed most people around here don't share the same skin colors people had back home...
These sleeves are more decorative than anything, so it's fine if I take them off.
They don't warm up my arms much, but I t-think these sleeves look nice...
Thankfully, t-this belt doesn't actually hold my dress together...
A-Alright... I'll just slide this off now...
J-Just my shoes, nothing too hard...
Sometimes I worry I'll f-fall if I'm not careful while I take off my shoes...
My d-dress feels heavier than usual...
(D-Don't worry Fluttershy... don't worry... I-It'll all be fine...)
Please don't look at me like that ~player~...
(This is all natural... there's nothing w-weird about showing your breasts to other people...)
D-Don't get your hopes up...
(They're really going to see all of me now...)
N-No use in feeling ashamed now is there..?
W-Well, underwear is pretty much just a swimsuit r-right..?
W-Well, underwear is pretty much just a swimsuit r-right..?
W-Well most people don't wear shoes at the beach right..?
{small}A-At least I'm not the only one like this...
(Oh dear... To have this much attention on me... I-I think I'm feeling a bit lightheaded...)

(Even if I'm only stripping small things... I'd rather not have all the attention on
m-me...)
(So far I haven't had to do anything embarrassing... {small}Hopefully it stays that way...{!reset})
P-Please don't get mad at me for choosing small items... {small}T-This is embarrassing for me...
A-Ah, the floor is a bit cold...
(T-That's the last thing I'm taking off before I... B-Before I... {small}Oooh...{!reset})
W-Well... this is my underwear... D-Do you think {small}it looks cute...?
I know this is why you play this kind of game b-but...
P-Please don't look at them so closely...
They're really nothing special... {small}S-So there's no need to look at them right...?
D-Don't worry about me... {small}I can handle this...
W-We were all born nude weren't we..? There is n-nothing wrong with showing your body to other people...
(I'll just imagine I'm at the beach... and t-this is my swimsuit...)
Oh! Ahaha! I get it!
Hm, I hope you're not planning on doing anything bad with that picture...
Oh how cute! I think it took a liking to you!
O-Oh, a tie... I guess we can just forget about that round?
Oh! I didn't think I'd see a tie! I thought those were very rare!
W-Well, I guess this is an opportunity to try for a better hand no?
EEK!!
H-Huh..? Couldn't you have taken that off before...?
Why didn't you take that off earlier..? D-Did you just want to show us your thing t-that badly...?
Shouldn't you have stripped t-that a little earlier...?
Y-Yes, of course... You should take off your ~clothing~ before anything else...
I-I'm glad you still have stuff like ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ on, ~target~...
Wearing small things like those can really add the extra bit of spice you need to complete your look sometimes.
It's not v-very difficult to take off small items, huh?
I guess you would have had to take it off at some point anyway...
R-Right... your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ the most logical option...
N-Nothing wrong with taking your time...
(Is that all he's taking off...?)
I guess there's no need to rush things yet...
I-I was hoping you'd take off a bit more b-but... {small}I guess that's fine too...
(Isn't it a bit a rude to take off something so small while I'm doing this..?)
(Is that all he's taking off...?)
I guess there's no need to rush things yet...
I-I was hoping you'd take off a bit more b-but... {small}I guess that's fine too...
G-Goodness... That really scared me Brock... At least you didn't get hurt...
O-Ok then... Strip however you feel most comfortable...
(People seem to strip in a rather odd order here sometimes...)
W-Well, do as you wish ~target~...
W-Well, let's hope you don't lose again too soon, y-yes..?
There's nothing to worry about... {small}...yet.
I-I hope you're feeling more comfortable now...
Well let's move on shall we...?
I-I hope you'll be joining me soon. {small}It would make me feel better...

I guess you should strip whatever makes you most comfortable.
